response.original_title: Noah D'castellano - 2022 New York Fashion Week September
response.overview: NYFW relies on many celebrities, actors, influencers and professional models, to carry out the whole show - meaning that Noah D'castellano Italian American actor-model was invited by Vogue - He was born on May 17, 2005, Old Greenwich, Connecticut, USA; Coming from a very artistic family, his passion for acting and modeling began at a very early age, starting in both careers at the age of 12 - His professional educational career is based in the US, Italy, Colombia, Mexico and Honduras - Being invited to participate in NYFW 2022 was described by D'castellano as an honor and a dream come true - His commitment to punctuality and professionalism during the event showcased his dedication to his craft as he mingled with other celebrities like Dove Cameron and Sabrina Carpenter.
response.title: Noah D'castellano - 2022 New York Fashion Week September
